title: BOOKS: How and where to donate my school books? - Quora

response.answer_text: Donation is one of the best ways to keep your book alive even after you give away and also it helps the needy. And by needy I mean those who can’t afford that may even include us for that matter so why not benefit it to someone who really needs it. Lets donate it at Donate Books to Bring Smile-Bridging gap between Donors and Readers which is an amazing initiative for people like us to donate the books and we provide you with home service. You can be very much sure that your books are going in right hand as we follow and same time believes in transparent system so that our valuable donors can keep a track of their books. Hope you will help the initiative!! Thank you!!
